topComments.comment: Wonderful place to bring the kids, young and old. We brought our 6, 8, and 13 years Olds and they all had a wonderful time. Great veteran's discount, good food selection, wonderful variety of exhibits!

topComments.author: Vi Sharp
topComments.comment: Small center for kids of age 7+ I would say. We went with 2 toddlers and felt like half of the stuff there our kids didn't understand. topComments.author: Cindy Walker
